Method Detail

doubleHelixCylinder

public static org.simtk.geometry3d.Cylinder doubleHelixCylinder(org.simtk.molecularstructure.nucleicacid.Duplex h)
                                                         throws org.simtk.geometry3d.InsufficientPointsException
Given a set of base paired residues, construct cylinder geometry to represent them. One side effect of this routine is to populate the private residueWedges data structure.

Returns:
a cylinder that approximates the location of the base stack.
Throws:
org.simtk.geometry3d.InsufficientPointsException
